duties_responsibilities.duty: Use social media platforms to engage and reach audiences.
Learn and manage association management software, website software, and social media platforms.
Proficiently use Microsoft Office products, e.g., Excel, Outlook, Word.
Assist in preparing sponsor/partner proposals and contracts.
Update the organization's website and manage written membership campaigns.
Support the management in various organizational areas as needed.
Prepare and post news and announcements on social media platforms.
Assist on-site at events and prepare Board meeting minutes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
